data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Yekaterinburg.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Yekaterinburg at VEB Arena.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yekaterinburg's half?
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
CSKA Moscow's Ilzat Akhmetov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yekaterinburg's Andrey Panyukov has run offside.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Yekaterinburg's half.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Yekaterinburg.
Free kick for Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
Yekaterinburg's Denis Polyakov has been booked in Moscow.
CSKA Moscow's Vadim Karpov gets in a shot on goal at VEB Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Yekaterinburg territory.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Yekaterinburg's half.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Yekaterinburg territory.

Arnor Sigurdsson (CSKA Moscow) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.

Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.

Yekaterinburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from CSKA Moscow.

In Moscow CSKA Moscow attack through Hordur Magnusson. The finish is off target, however.
